title: Latest StartAllBack beta makes Windows 11 dark mode more consistent
content:
While Windows 11 comes with a few UI improvements, dark mode still isn’t super consistent across the OS especially with some of the legacy elements still available. Thankfully, there are third-party tools trying to fix this, such as StartAllBack. The latest beta version of StartAllBack brings dark mode to even more parts of Windows 11,

The post Latest StartAllBack beta makes Windows 11 dark mode more consistent appeared first on xda-developers.
description: The latest version of StartAllBack for Windows 11 brings dark mode to even more places, including the Control Panel and file transfers.
